amendment.description: To provide for a safe return to in-person instruction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1344 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 81.

action.text: Amendment SA 1344 proposed by Senator Hassan to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1236-1237; text: CR S1236) To provide for a safe return to in-person instruction.
